vision and machine learning software library.

HDF5 library from Python.

Very small utility class for using Kerberos authentication with Python

dependencies.name: py-matplotlib
dependencies.description:
Matplotlib is a comprehensive library for creating static, animated, and
interactive visualizations in Python.

dependencies.name: py-mpi4py
dependencies.description:
This package provides Python bindings for the Message Passing Interface
(MPI) standard. It is implemented on top of the MPI-1/MPI-2
specification and exposes an API which grounds on the standard MPI-2 C++
bindings.

dependencies.name: py-mypy-extensions
dependencies.description:
Experimental type system extensions for programs checked with the mypy
typechecker.

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-prometheus-client
dependencies.description: Prometheus instrumentation library for Python applications.

dependencies.name: py-psalg
dependencies.description: LCLS II Developement: PSAlg Python.

dependencies.name: py-psmon
dependencies.description: Monitors and limits process resource.

dependencies.name: py-pyabel
dependencies.description: A Python package for forward and inverse Abel transforms.

dependencies.name: py-pymongo
dependencies.description:
The PyMongo distribution contains tools for interacting with MongoDB
database from Python. The bson package is an implementation of the BSON
format for Python. The pymongo package is a native Python driver for
MongoDB. The gridfs package is a gridfs implementation on top of
pymongo. PyMongo supports MongoDB 2.6, 3.0, 3.2, 3.4, 3.6, 4.0 and 4.2.

dependencies.name: py-pyzmq

dependencies.description: Python HTTP for Humans.

dependencies.name: py-scikit-learn
dependencies.description: A set of python modules for machine learning and data mining.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-wheel
